name: Synthesizer 7DRL 2015
description:
keys: numpad 2 4 6 8 to move, or cursor keys

5 on numpad or space to skip a beat

enter to start

Synthesizer is my 7 day roguelike challenge game for 2015. It's a roguelike where the damage you and the mobs do is controlled by a synthesizer. The game can be pretty complicated without instructions.

Web page instructions and instructional video can be found linked on this page:

https://pangoempire.wordpress.com/2015/03/15/295/
